verses.verse: The LORD <S%H3068><s%> also spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Appoint <S%H5414><s%> out for you <S%H853><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of refuge, <S%H4733><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> I spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses: <S%H4872><s%>

That the slayer <S%H7523><s%> that killeth <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> unawares <S%H7684><s%> and unwittingly <S%H1097><s%> <S%H1847><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> thither: <S%H8033><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> your refuge <S%H4733><s%> from the avenger <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1350><s%> of blood. <S%H1818><s%>

And when he that doth flee <S%H5127><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of those <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> at the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and shall declare <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> his cause <S%H1697><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> they shall take <S%H622><s%> him into the city <S%H5892><s%> unto them, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H413><s%> him a place, <S%H4725><s%> that he may dwell <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> them.

And if <S%H3588><s%> the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, then they shall not <S%H3808><s%> deliver <S%H5462><s%> <S%H853><s%> the slayer <S%H7523><s%> up into his hand; <S%H3027><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> unwittingly, <S%H1097><s%> <S%H1847><s%> and hated <S%H8130><s%> him not <S%H3808><s%> formerly. <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>

And he shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> for judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and until <S%H5704><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> that <S%H834><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> then <S%H227><s%> shall the slayer <S%H7523><s%> return, <S%H7725><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his own city, <S%H5892><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> his own house, <S%H1004><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> from whence <S%H834><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he fled. <S%H5127><s%>

And they appointed <S%H6942><s%> <S%H853><s%> Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> and Shechem <S%H7927><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and Kirjath-arba, <S%H7153><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

And on the other side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> by Jericho <S%H3405><s%> eastward, <S%H4217><s%> they assigned <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> Bezer <S%H1221><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> upon the plain <S%H4334><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> appointed <S%H4152><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them, that whosoever <S%H3605><s%> killeth <S%H5221><s%> any person <S%H5315><s%> at unawares <S%H7684><s%> might flee <S%H5127><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>
